mapper.select:
select assessmould_id, assessmould_name, assessmould_makeDate, assessmould_enable, assessmould_memo, assessmould_total, assessmould_type from erp_am_assessmould
assessmould_id = #{id}

mapper.select:
select
distinct
from erp_am_assess
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into erp_am_assess (assess_id, assess_mould, assess_name, assess_staff, assess_staffdate, assess_boss, assess_bossdate, assess_staffpoints, assess_bosspoints, assess_enable, assess_summary) values (#{assessId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{assessMould.assessmouldId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{assessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessStaff.staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{assessStaffdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessBoss.staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{assessBossdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assessStaffpoints,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{assessBosspoints,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{assessEnable,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{assessSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

assess_mould = #{assessMould.assessmouldId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
